record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 04, 2007)

[Page: H11298]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, due to a family emergency I missed the following votes on Thursday, October 4, 2007. I would have voted as follows:
Final Passage of H.R. 2740, MEJA Expansion and Enforcement Act of 2007--"aye."
Democratic Motion on Ordering the Previous Question on the Rule for H.R. 3246--Regional Economic and Infrastructure Development Act of 2007 (H. Res. 704)--"yea."
Rule to provide for consideration of H.R. 3246--Regional Economic and Infrastructure Development Act of 2007 (H. Res. 704)--"yea."
Democratic Motion on Ordering the Previous Question on the Rule for H.R. 3648--Mortgage Forgiveness Debt Relief Act of 2007 (H. Res. 703)--"yea."
Final Passage of H.R. 3246--Regional Economic and Infrastructure Development Act of 2007--"yea."
Final Passage of H.R. 3648--Mortgage Forgiveness Debt Relief Act of 2007--"yea."
